General.Name: PT Duta Pertiwi Tbk
General.Description: PT Duta Pertiwi Tbk primarily engages in the real estate business in Indonesia. It operates through Real Estate, Property, and Hotel segments. The company offers shop houses, warehouse and industrial estate properties, commercial lots, apartments, international trade centers, shopping malls, and office buildings, as well as land; and rents and manages real estate properties. It also operates hotels and a recreation arena. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in North Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Duta Pertiwi Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Bumi Serpong Damai Tbk.
General.Address: ITC Mangga Dua, North Jakarta, Indonesia, 14430
